<template>
     <select v-model="selectedSize">
       <option v-for="(size) in sizeList" :key="size"
        value={{ size }}
       ></option>
     </select>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    //name: "SelectFontSize",
    data: function(){
        return{
            selectedSize: null,
            sizeList: [1,2,3,4,5]
        }
    }
}
</script>


<style>
</style>
